abstracts.cdata!:
The Fourth Highway Construction Project
            will involve construction and paving of a total of 681 km of
            national and state highways in the states of Bahia, Minas
            Gerais, Espirito Santo, Parana, Santa Catarina and Rio
            Grande do Sul; and consulting services for supervision of
            this work.
